title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: get up and running with Llama 3.2, Mistral, Gemma 2 and other large language models locally.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python library for Ollama: chat, generate, embed, pull, list and delete models with a few lines of code.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Ollama: works in Node, Bun, Deno and browsers via fetch.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration: use any Ollama model as an LLM, chat or embeddings provider inside LangChain pipelines.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich web UI for Ollama (formerly Ollama-WebUI): chat UI, model management, RAG, multi-user, dark mode.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama: fluent builder API, streaming, embeddings, list/pull/delete models.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Official Ruby gem for Ollama: simple idiomatic Ruby wrapper over the HTTP API.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Go CLI that wraps ollama with progress bars, batch jobs, model diff and update commands.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension that brings local Ollama models into GitHub Copilot’s UI and autocomplete.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration: use Ollama models as generators or embedders in Haystack NLP pipelines.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: Community-maintained C#/.NET client for Ollama: supports .NET 6+, nullable ref types, streaming.

title: ollama-docker-compose
summary: Production-ready Docker Compose stack: Ollama + Open-WebUI + GPU support, nginx, auto-updates.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Helm chart for deploying Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU node-selector, ingress and autoscaling.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Minimal RAG example: ingest PDFs → Chroma → Ollama embeddings & chat, all local.

title: ollama-discord-bot
summary: Self-host Discord bot that lets servers chat with any Ollama model via slash commands.

title: ollama-slack-bot
summary: Slack Bolt app that brings Ollama models into channels/DMs with thread support and rate limits.

title: ollama-npm
summary: Official npm package: zero-dependency TypeScript client, 100 kB, 50 k weekly downloads.

title: ollama PyPI
summary: Official Python package: lightweight wrapper, 30 k weekly downloads, supports 3.8+.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Community Rust crate: async tokio-based client with serde, available on crates.io.

title: ollama-macos-swift
summary: Swift Package Manager wrapper for macOS apps: Combine publishers, SwiftUI sample app.
